omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
with results as
(
	select
		distinct
			op.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
			op.NHSNumber,
			op.AppointmentDate,
			op.AppointmentTime,
			p.ProcedureOPCS as PrimaryProcedure
	from omop_staging.sus_OP op
		inner join omop_staging.sus_OP_OPCSProcedure p
		on op.MessageId = p.MessageId
	where NHSNumber is not null
		and AttendedorDidNotAttend in ('5','6')
)
select *
from results
order by 
	GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	NHSNumber,
	AppointmentDate, 
	AppointmentTime,
	PrimaryProcedure

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: GeneratedRecordIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
with results as
(

		distinct

			op.NHSNumber,
			op.AppointmentDate,
			op.AppointmentTime,
			p.ProcedureOPCS as PrimaryProcedure
	from omop_staging.sus_OP op
		inner join omop_staging.sus_OP_OPCSProcedure p
		on op.MessageId = p.MessageId
	where NHSNumber is not null
		and AttendedorDidNotAttend in ('5','6')
)
select *
from results
order by 
	GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	NHSNumber,
	AppointmentDate, 
	AppointmentTime,
	PrimaryProcedure

omopColumns.name: observation_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Maps concepts to standard valid concepts in the `Observation` domain.

omopColumns.name: observation_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. EHR administration record

omopColumns.name: observation_source_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Resolve OPCS4 codes to OMOP concepts. If code cannot be mapped, map using the parent code.
omopColumns.query:
with results as
(
	select
		distinct
			op.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
			op.NHSNumber,
			op.AppointmentDate,
			op.AppointmentTime,

		on op.MessageId = p.MessageId

		and AttendedorDidNotAttend in ('5','6')

select *
from results
order by 
	GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	NHSNumber,
	AppointmentDate, 
	AppointmentTime,
	PrimaryProcedure
